What's Possible on Grid 2

While we work to open testing of Grid 3.0, we wanted to outline what's already available to test on Grid 2.

09 September 2021  · 

While we work to open testing of Grid 3.0 to our community, questions are coming in around how to get started testing the Grid today.

In this post, Scott outlines what’s currently available to test on Grid 2.

If you’re interested in testing on the ThreeFold Grid, please join our testing community.
